original: Augzell, Oscar, överlärare. Mjölby, f. 24/12/98 i Göteborg. G. 24 m. folksk :lär :an Swea Maria Elisabeth Thorén. Barn: Bengt-Olof f. 28, d. 45, Göran-Ingemar 32, Birgitta 37. •— Folksk :’lär :ex. i Gbg 20. Föret. res. t. Tyskl., Österr. o. Ital. Vik. folksk :lär. i Molkom, Karlskrona o. Vanstad, ord. dito i Ore 21-22, i Björketorp 24-35, i Skara 35-41, tillsyn :lär. i Björketorp 30-35, överlär. i Mjölby sed. 41. Ordf. i Björketorps barnav:-nd 27-30, rev. f. Skara stads räkenskap. 40-41, ordf. i Mjölby simsällsk. fr. 42, led. av Mjöilby stadsfullm. o. beredn:utsk. ised. 43, ordf. i Mjölby civ:försv:nd sed. 43. Skr. bl. a.: Helhet s u n der vis ni n g ( Ge sam tu n t e r r i c h t), Praktiska sk riv eks er samt upps. i den pedagog. fackpres’sien, tills. m. rektor Eimar Lilie red. f. iäseboksserien Från kunskapens fält.
translated: Augzell, Oscar, Head Teacher. Mjölby, born on December 24, 1898 in Gothenburg. Married Swea Maria Elisabeth Thorén, a primary school teacher, on May 24th. Children: Bengt-Olof born in 1928 and died in 1945, Göran-Ingemar born in 1932, and Birgitta born in 1937. Augzell passed his primary school teacher exam in Gothenburg in 1920. He went on to travel to Germany, Austria, and Italy. He worked as a substitute primary school teacher in Molkom, Karlskrona, and Vanstad, and a regular primary school teacher in Ore from 1921-1922, in Björketorp from 1924-1935, in Skara from 1935-1941, and as an inspector in Björketorp from 1930-1935. He became a Head Teacher in Mjölby in 1941. Augzell served as the chairman of the Björketorps children's committee from 1927-1930, reviewed the accounts for the city of Skara in 1940-1941, served as the chairman of the Mjölby swimming club from 1942, and was a member of the Mjölby City Council and Planning Committee since 1943. He has written articles on comprehensive education, practical handwriting exercises, and pedagogical publications, and co-edited the book series "Från kunskapens fält" with Principal Eimar Lilie.

memberOf.name: Mjölby City Council and Planning Committee
